English: However, it was one of Rie Kishibe's traps.
Chinese: 不過，那是「岸部里繪」設下的陷阱。
German: Doch das war eine von Rie Kishibes Fallen.

English:
She burned with ambition to control Kamishiro,
and went to Kyoko Kuremi, accusing Satoru
Kamishiro himself of committing the crimes.
Chinese:
她滿懷掌握神代實權的野心，向暮海杏子控訴
神代悟留才是不正當行為的罪魁禍首——
Korean:
카미시로의 실권을 쥐겠다는 야심으로 불타오르던 그녀는,
쿠레미 쿄쿄에게 카미시로 사토루야말로 부정의 장본인이라고 호소했고―
German:
In ihrem Ehrgeiz wollte sie Kamishiro unbedingt
übernehmen. Sie ging also zu Kyoko Kuremi und
schwärzte Satoru Kamishiro selbst an.

English: Even the evidence was brilliantly faked.
Donations to politicians, selling user data...
Chinese: 政治獻金、用戶個人資料的買賣——
German: Spenden an Politiker, Verkauf von Nutzerdaten ...

English:
It was just the sort of story that the media
was going to have a field day over.
Chinese:
最後還加上自己的不倫戀等等，
新聞媒體會爭相報導的“桃色緋聞（新聞題材）”。
Korean:
끝내는 자신과의 불륜이라는, 매스컴이 달려들 법한
"유언비어"까지 입에 담으면서, 말이지
German:
Es war genau die Art Geschichte, über die sich die
Medien das Maul zerreißen.

English:
But a trap even bigger than Rie Kishibe's was in
the works, laid by someone else.
Chinese:
不過……比起岸部里繪的陷阱，有個規模更大的陷阱，
經由某個人物的雙手所設下。
Korean:
하지만… 키시베 리에의 함정보다도, 더 큰 함정이
어느 인물의 손에 의해 준비되어 있었다
German:
Doch jemand anders hatte eine noch größere Falle
als Rie Kishibe ausgelegt.

English:
Kyoko Kuremi was consumed by an Eater!
She contracted EDEN Syndrome, as did Rie Kishibe.
Chinese:
然後，暮海杏子被侵食者吞噬，
和岸部里繪一樣，罹患了EDEN症候群——
Korean:
그리고 쿠레미 쿄코는 이터에게 먹혀
키시베 리에와 함께, EDEN 증후군에 걸렸다―
German:
Kyoko Kuremi wurde von einem Verschlinger
gefressen! Sie zog sich das EDEN-Syndrom zu, genau
wie Rie Kishibe.
